duties_responsibilities.duty: The Physician Assistant is responsible for the overall management and supervision of the practice. The position requires excellent internal and external business office relations, supervision and leadership.
Effectively interacts with patients, and other staff, while maintaining standards of professional services, medical care and attention to detail.
The position also requires excellent internal and external communication and people skills and clinical skills (lab draws, vital, injections, etc.).

education_certification.credential: Current and valid PA License, Current BLS (AHA) upon hire and maintain current. Bilingual preferred; but not required
